text: Opel Calibra is a car produced by Opel between 1990 and 1997. It was sold as a Vauxhall in the United Kingdom. == Engines == * 2.0 i 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.0 i 16V 100 kW (136 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 i 16V Turbo 150 kW (204 hp) * 2.5 i V6 125 kW (170 hp) Calibra Category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:1990s automobiles
title: Opel Calibra
